sentences: Inimsoo geeniused. Nii võib kirjutada ainult Shakespeare'i taoline geenius.
Ta on silmapaistev teadlane, kuid mitte geenius.
context: In Estonian, 'geenius' refers to exceptionally talented people or the highest level of creative talent. It can also refer to a protective spirit in Roman mythology. The word is derived from Latin and means an individual with extraordinary intellectual abilities or creativity.
